name: Police Dog Catch Crime
description:
The police dog is specifically trained to assist police and law enforcement officers in their work. The trained police dog can search for explosives, drugs and look for crime scene evidence. Save the people from criminals and make sure you get the criminals in time before they get away.

Features:
• Police Dog Chase in pursuit of criminals & robbers
• City Crime Scenes with multiple missions
• Run, jump, chase and attach robbers
• Help police department in controlling crime.
• Amazing 3D environment and sounds
